played it for a few times once, it was pretty good

I wanted to find a game which is fun and aim-intensive (to improve my aim), also fun at the same time. There lied csgo, which fit perfectly. The aim, the map, the nades, the creativity etc. Though there are some flaws. There are 2 ways to play csgo, MM and FACEIT/ESEA. Invisible cheaters, that how I like to call them, are something that annoys me, eg using anti-aim, backtrack . Not simply because they are cheating in MM obviously, but because of the changes in my mentality. Is it their fault ? Or am I simply out-classed literally. 
However in FACEIT, there's only one person to blame and that's yourself. MM can be really fun, having spent a lot of hours there and almost reaching the highest rank. Yet with its current system, which seemed quite inferior due to the number of hackers compared to other games I've played, it is not recommended in the sense of playing MM competitively. However anything else ? Definitely recommended.
This game is Aim bot, which is good for your aim practice.
